definition[0]: the act of taking part in an activity or event, or the way in which you take part in it
example[0]: School officials say they welcome parental involvement.
example[1]: His new book examines the United States’ involvement in World War II.
example[2]: Carey’s possible involvement with a series of robberies
definition[1]: something that you take part in or spend time doing
definition[2]: the feeling of excitement and satisfaction that you get from an activity
example[5]: Weaver admitted a strong emotional involvement in her client’s case.
definition[3]: a romantic relationship between two people, especially when they are not married to each other
example[6]: Donna knew nothing of her husband’s involvement with another woman.
